p: To determine if adult mosquito body size influenced the amount of sugar detected in specimens, the wings were used as a proxy for body size ( Van Handel and Day 1988). Before the heat fixing step, the right wing of each adult was removed and measured from the axillary incision to the apical margin, excluding fringe hairs ( Nasci 1990) with the aid of a digital microscope (Dino-Lite, Torrance, CA). Samples collected in 2019 were measured with a USB digital microscope (Bysameyee, China), calibrated with the same calibration tool used previously.
